info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 5:26PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Broadwater, south central Meagher and northeastern Gallatin Counties through 615 PM MDT... At 526 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Townsend, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, pea size hail, and brief heavy rain showers. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Townsend, Toston and Ringling. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
